theOath.title: The Oath
theOath.description: The film tells the story of a child caught between cinema and reality, as industrial pollution threatens the natural world.

weaning.title: Weaning
weaning.description: The mother, Inanna, lives in her own world, experiencing denial and detachment as the departure of one of her children approaches. She desperately tries to delay this moment.

juryMember2023.title: Jury Member - Mediterranean Cinema Festival 2023
juryMember2023.description: Role: Jury Member - Official Feature Film Competition - 18th Edition

soulsOnTheOtherStrand.title: Souls on the Other Strand
soulsOnTheOtherStrand.description: Short Documentary Film. Synopsis: A tribute inspired by a scene from Apocalypse Now, the film explores the hidden conflict between ruling forces and the people who become fuel for wars. Amidst violence and symbolic imagery, the village madman uncovers the truth ignored by all, while the "barn owner" remains a symbol of the hidden power orchestrating events from behind the scenes.

dreamInACauldon.title: Dream in a Cauldron
dreamInACauldon.description: Short Fiction Promotional Film. Story: A film about the workers of the steel factory for metal industries, highlighting their daily challenges under war and their determination to continue despite the risks.

fromTheWombOfFire.title: From the Womb of Fire: The Birth
fromTheWombOfFire.description: Promotional Spot. Story: Documenting the moment steel transforms into metal from melting inside a giant furnace through an explosive charge, focusing on the silence, proximity, and the tremendous sound that reflects the greatness of the event.

whatIsPlanted.title: What is Planted in Our Souls Grows on Our Faces
whatIsPlanted.description: Advertising Spot. Story: On the occasion of the tenth anniversary of the steel plant for metal industries, we have captured genuine moments of long-time workers across various departments and specialties, highlighting their efforts, whether intellectual or physical.

theReturn.title: The Return
theReturn.description: Feature Film (Epic / Apocalyptic). Story: The story unfolds between two different worlds, marking both the beginning and the end. The First World: Set in the distant past... The Second World: Set in the near future, around the year 2060, after biological and military wars have devastated the world... Note: 35% of the film was shot, but production was halted due to the COVID-19 pandemic and lockdown restrictions.

moralTerror.title: MORALTERROR
moralTerror.description: Experimental Short Film. Synopsis: A tribute inspired by a scene from Apocalypse Now, the film explores the hidden conflict between ruling forces and the people who become fuel for wars.

winterPerfume.title: WINTER PERFUME
winterPerfume.description: MUSIC VIDEO. Description: The video features scenes set between a museum and the seashore, where the main character recalls figures from the film Son of the Earth, transforming them into museum exhibits. This visual journey extends the cinematic project through music and imagery, creating a harmonious blend that enhances the essence of the composition Winter Fragrance.

gypsiesOfWar.title: Gypsies of War
gypsiesOfWar.description: Short Promotional Film. Story: The film deals with the issue of illegal immigration in Libya, highlighting the efforts of the Libyan authorities in combating it and the challenges they face in addressing this phenomenon.

sonOfTheGroundPart2.title: Son of the Ground Part Two
sonOfTheGroundPart2.description: SHORT FILM. Synopsis: "Son of the ground" lives in a chaotic city governed by the tyrannical leader "El Capo," who pursues the original violin and the musical manuscript, believing it grants him absolute power. While Son of the ground tries to protect the knowledge from the control of tyranny, the conflict reaches its climax when the grand master is sentenced to death for refusing to reveal the musical secrets.

essoudAyouno.title: Essoud Ayouno
essoudAyouno.description: MUSIC VIDEO. Synopsis: Gypsy-inspired aesthetics are revived as a collective memory, with vibrant colors and free-spirited dances enhancing the dreamlike quality of the story.

pathOfDeath.title: Path of Death
pathOfDeath.description: Series - Copy zero. Story: A fierce conflict erupts between families over illegal smuggling operations in the border area in Tunisia, where a network of influence and betrayal is formed within the dangerous world of crime.

sonOfTheGroundPart1.title: son of the ground part one
sonOfTheGroundPart1.description: medium FILM. Story: "Son of the Ground" carries a magical musical instrument that symbolizes peace and resistance... In the midst of this conflict, the search for the original instrument and the secret manuscript becomes a decisive battle between the forces of oppression and the voice of freedom.

wardNo6.title: WARD NO.6
wardNo6.description: Drama Lab (Cinema - Theater). Story: Set in a small psychiatric hospital for women inside a convent, where the new director is confronted with treatment methods based on strict religious doctrines, folk magic, and inherited social superstitions.

laswadMagrouni.title: Laswad Magrouni
laswadMagrouni.description: The song Laswad Magrouni is inspired by Maghrebian folk heritage, reinvented with a fusion of traditional melodies and modern rap beats, portraying an intense rivalry between a tribal leader and a humble young man over the love of a mesmerizing woman with striking black eyes

theShy.title: The Shy
theShy.description: In a modest tourist inn in southern Tunisia, a shy and troubled young man silently observes the guests. As his inner turmoil intensifies, he decides to kidnap one of them, setting off a gripping chain of events that unravels his deep psychological struggles

biography.title: BIOGRAPHY
biography.quote: The Godfather became an artistic and productive reference for me, shaping my understanding of cinematic storytelling.
biography.paragraph1: Samuel Skhieh, an independent filmmaker and producer of Syrian origin, was born in 1987 in Latakia, Syria. He studied economics but found his true calling in the arts, beginning his journey in university theater and various independent projects. His passion for cinema was ignited early on, and he was greatly influenced by the film 'The Godfather' by Francis Ford Coppola, which became an artistic and productive reference for him.
biography.paragraph2: Since there were no formal film schools in Syria, he started making his own films independently and developed his skills in a self-taught manner. He directed two short films in Syria before moving to Tunisia in 2016 during the Syrian war, continuing to make his independent short films. Between 2017 and 2018, he directed three short films.
biography.paragraph3: He worked on the production and direction of a cinematic-theatrical laboratory titled 'Ward - N°6', which received widespread acclaim from the artistic and cultural community. He then ventured into directing music videos and commercials with famous artists, garnering millions of views.
biography.paragraph4: He also created a remarkable experience with the violinist and composer Mohamed Al-Gharbi in a two-part musical short film titled 'Son of the ground', the first of its kind in the Arab world celebrating instrumental music. He made his debut in series by directing and writing the first episode of the series 'Path of Death'.
biography.paragraph5: He worked on the production, direction, and writing of his first feature-length narrative film titled 'The Return', 35% of which was filmed in 2021 due to the coronavirus pandemic. Upon returning to Syria, he produced and directed a short documentary titled 'Souls on the Other STRAND', which was particularly appreciated by judging committees.
biography.paragraph6: Currently, he is in the post-production phase of his first feature-length documentary, along with updates such as resuming filming for 'The Return' in 2026.

about.title: ABOUT
about.name: SAMUEL SKHIEH
about.shortBio: Award-winning filmmaker known for his unique visual style and distinctive narrative approach
about.fullBio:
Samuel Skhieh is a distinguished director known for his bold visual style and psychological depth. Beginning his career with experimental short films, he quickly established himself as a visionary in independent cinema.

His work often explores themes of memory, identity, and human connection through stunning visual compositions and innovative narrative techniques. His unique approach to cinematography has earned him recognition at international film festivals including Cannes, Sundance, and Venice.
